projects.title: Aurora Innovative Learning Platform
projects.description: Full-stack learning platform build with Next.js and AppWrite

projects.title: UniHub - All-in-One University Management System
projects.description: UniHub is a comprehensive university management system developed for the NEOFETCH Hackathon Inventious 4.1 that streamlines campus life by integrating academic management, communication, navigation, dining, transportation, and security features into a single, user-friendly application.

projects.title: A Education Exam System for A Event [Name: Dig The Data 3.0]
projects.description: This Django-based Event and Exam Management System enables teams to participate in educational or competitive quizzes with features for user authentication, team management, question answering with hints, and real-time score tracking.
